name: Ramayan - A Match 3 Brick Breaker Battle Adventure
name_original: Ramayan - A Match 3 Brick Breaker Battle Adventure
description:
Make bubble chains to fight monsters and break bricks to face demon bosses in battle as you help Rama rescue Seeta from the clutches of Ravana, the Demon King.
Ramayan – Bubble Brick Blast is a match 3 plus brick breaker puzzle adventure offering Two games in One !
All of this is set in an amazing Indian mythological theme.
FEATURES:
(1) Match 3 chains puzzle adventure
(2) Demon face off in a brick breaker game
(3) Gorgeous art work spanning a mythological fantasy world
(4) Numerous levels and scenes
(5) Bonus power ups and upgrades to give you the extra edge
(6) Full game for FREE. No in app purchase required
